explains: v. （与某人）摔跤，扭打；使劲搬动，用力操作；努力解决，艰难对付（wrestle 的现在分词）

sentences.en: There is a wrestling match tonight.
Only football, volleyball, Greco-Roman wrestling, and freestyle wrestling remained for sale on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 周日只剩足球，排球，古典式摔跤和自由式摔跤门票还没售完。

sentences.en: The anthropologists analyzed the results of four combat sports at the summer games: boxing, tae kwon do, Greco-Roman wrestling and freestyle wrestling.
sentences.cn: 人类学家们分析了雅典夏季奥运会中四项格斗项目的比赛结果，它们分别是拳击、跆拳道、古典式摔跤和自由式摔跤。
